original_title: A Imagem da Música - Os Anos de Influência da MTV Brasil
overview: The documentary goes through the 23 years of MTV Brazil, taking stock from the avant-garde to the ostracism of the broadcaster that was the main guide for the musical, cultural and social formation of young people in the 90's and 2000's with interviews and testimonials from former VJ's and artists that emerged and became popular in the country because of the channel.
title: A Imagem da Música - Os Anos de Influência da MTV Brasil
